## constants namespace

## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [COLLAPSED\_FIELD\_NAME](./blockly.constants.collapsed_field_name.md) | The language-neutral ID given to the collapsed field. |
|  [COLLAPSED\_INPUT\_NAME](./blockly.constants.collapsed_input_name.md) | The language-neutral ID given to the collapsed input. |
|  [MANUALLY\_DISABLED](./blockly.constants.manually_disabled.md) | The language-neutral ID for when the reason why a block is disabled is because the user manually disabled it, such as via the context menu. |
